Thank You For Subscribing!

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. You can be sure to be kept fully up to date with everything going on with the Leinster Trophy. As the event takes place annually, there are long periods of the year where in all honesty not a lot is happening. During these times you won't hear from us. In the build up to the event we will keep you upto date on all the important information and provide you with a post race summary. Each email will include an unsubscribe link at the bottom, so if you ever wish to stop receiving the newsletter you can.
